Sentencas: As a Ruddlesden-Popper (RP) phase solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode material, Pr2NiO4+$ (PNO) is a critical challenge for SOFC commercialization due to the lack of oxygen va-cancies and insufficient redox reaction (ORR) activity.
Titulo: Preparation of Pr2NiO4?8-La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-8 as a high-performance cathode material for SOFC by an impregnation method

Sentencas: In this paper, various concentrations of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-$ (LSC) nanoparticles are coated on the surface of PNO by an impregnation method, and the ORR kinetics of PNO is found to be improved by constructing a composite cathode with heterointerfaces.
Titulo: Preparation of Pr2NiO4?8-La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-8 as a high-performance cathode material for SOFC by an impregnation method

Sentencas: The formation of the heterointerface effectively enhances the transfer of interstitial oxygen in the PNO and the oxygen vacancies in LSC, which can promote the conduction of O2- in the cathode and thus improves the ORR activity of the material.
Titulo: Preparation of Pr2NiO4?8-La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-8 as a high-performance cathode material for SOFC by an impregnation method

Sentencas: When the impregnation concentration of LSC reached CLSC = 0.2 mol L-1, the ORR activity can reach the highest level.
Titulo: Preparation of Pr2NiO4?8-La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-8 as a high-performance cathode material for SOFC by an impregnation method

Sentencas: At 700 degrees C, the area-specific resistance of PNO-LSC reaches 0.024 CI cm2, which is 83.4% lower than that of PNO (0.145 CI cm2).
Titulo: Preparation of Pr2NiO4?8-La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-8 as a high-performance cathode material for SOFC by an impregnation method

Sentencas: And the peak power density of PNO-LSC reaches 0.618 W cm -2, which is 1.89 times larger than that of PNO (0.327 W cm -2).
Titulo: Preparation of Pr2NiO4?8-La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-8 as a high-performance cathode material for SOFC by an impregnation method

Sentencas: Therefore, the construction of composite cathodes with hetero-interfaces via impregnation provides an alternative strategy for enhancing the ORR activity of the cathode materials in SOFC.(c) 2022 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Preparation of Pr2NiO4?8-La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-8 as a high-performance cathode material for SOFC by an impregnation method
